parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get the visible EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

title: IView.GetVisibleEntityCount
signature:
System.Int32 GetVisibleEntityCount( 
   Component2
LpViewComponent
,
   System.Int32
EntityType
)

parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get the visible EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

returns: Number of specified entities in LpViewComponent
remarks:
Visible entities are only those entities not completely obscured by other entities in the view.
Call this method before calling
IView::IGetVisibleEntities
to get the size of the array for that method.
